alert.note: Alert for Newcastle; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 05 at 8:18PM MDT until October 07 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM MDT FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Northern Foot Hills. In Wyoming, Northern Campbell County, Southern Campbell County, the Weston County Plains and the Newcastle Area. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 8 AM MDT Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Newcastle; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains
